name: consulthub
description: ConsultHub is a healthcare platform for booking doctor appointments and remote consultations. Patients can find doctors, schedule appointments, and consult online. Doctors get a dashboard for managing appointments and viewing patient stats. Built with [insert stack]. Contributions welcome!

scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon backend/server.js" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
